Posts.Content: omg my wee, trumps and number 2's were so bad i made myself feel sick! glad it wasnt just me! AC was the worst. am on T now and its nowhere near as bad. 6 weeks and counting!!!! :-)
Posts.Title: Chemo farts

Posts.Content: slightly different but the insensitivity is the same. im in hospital and the theres a woman around my age in next bed. started chatting to her hubby and he tells me she has secondries in various places. i sympathise and he asks what i have. i explained i have early breast cancer and he replies "OH YEAH THATS HOW MY WIFE STARTED" what the actual ****?? say nothing pal because i really didnt need to hear that!!! im sure that he didnt mean it but when he walked away i broke my heart crying. id never considered it might spread till that point. i was convinced the docs would sort me out and that would be that. i may be naive but i liked that happy place. ive been worrying ever since.Â
Posts.Title: Your cancer wasn't bad then....
